 2012-09712012-07-05,  ,  ,  EC,  CEAA, 
ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act, 2012
SubjectCost Recovery Regulations
PrecisCOST RECOVERY REGULATIONS in order to support the cost recovery provisions of the Canadian Environmental Assessment Act, 2012 by prescribing the costs in relation to the environmental assessment of a project that the Agency can recover from the proponent of that project.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0146 Publication Date: 2012-07-18
